summary: User unable to invoke activities in the example project because StartActivity is not yet implemented in the early-stage PHP SDK.
userImpact: Users cannot test or learn the PHP SDK with provided examples due to incomplete implementation.
rootCause: StartActivity functionality was not implemented in the early development phase of the PHP SDK.
workaround: Use the samples-php repository for working examples instead of the main example project.
resolutionDetails: Issue was a limitation of the early SDK development stage, resolved by directing user to working samples in a separate repository.
keyQuote: This SDK is under development. We will announce separately as soon as there is a working version with working examples ready for testing.
